nodes.text: MandalTech was a Mandalorian company located on the planet Mandalore. A sister company to MandalMotors, MandalTech specialized in the development of starships and weapons. Along with MandalMotors and Mandal Hypernautics, MandalTech was a producer of the Canderous-class assault tank. Many of MandalTech's designs that were not intentionally created for warfare were found to be easily adapted to military use, all the same.

MandalTech was first introduced to Star Wars canon via a brief mention in 2008 in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, and under the entry for the Canderous-class assault tank. The company was later mentioned again in the reference book The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett, a bounty hunter guide authored by Daniel Wallace, Jason Fry, and Ryder Windham.
